'''3.0.13''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on September 9, 2024.

== Changes ==
* Renamed the "''Minecraft for Windows''" tab to "''Minecraft: Bedrock Edition''".

== Fixes ==
* Bug fixes to make sure critical Launcher updates flow smoothly and correctly.
